title: Can you not?
body: Can people just stop picking Fiora in ranked. She does shitall, just like before.

replies.body:

just 

hydra Bork Trinity Boots and 2 tank items

(getting cutlass into hydra makes sticking for her ult easier)

She is an unstoppable late game killing machine
She can actually be very overbearing in lane due to her passive and her ult heal is quite good in teamfights.
What are her new abilities thus far?{{item:3009}}
